channel.title: [PI] Can't change portal and/or portal message
channel.description:
hi,
I'm getting kinda frustrated about this.. I can't change the location of where my portal goes or the message you get in the chatbox.. I'm getting 1 error when compiling but thats cause of the slayer points thingy and that doesnt have to do anything with it. I changed the settings in objectmanager and actionhandler and then i compile but its still the same... the monsters do change when i compile but the message in the chatbox stays the same.. even if I delete the whole portal case and message, and then compile, it's still there..
Do i forget something?

item.title: [PI] Can't change portal and/or portal message
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

when u got an error it doesn’t compile ;D

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Can't change portal and/or portal message
